RecordOperationSpec.Name: Remove Recurring Gift from Sponsorship
RecordOperationSpec.Description: This is used to help fix a data conversion issue with finanacial sponsors
RecordOperationSpec.Author: Cary Mayeda

SPOperationImplementation.common:CreateProcedureSQL:
create procedure dbo.USR_USP_SPONSORSHIP_REMOVEREVENUESPLITID_UPDATE ( @ID uniqueidentifier, @CHANGEAGENTID uniqueidentifier ) as begin
if @CHANGEAGENTID is null exec dbo.USP_CHANGEAGENT_GETORCREATECHANGEAGENT @CHANGEAGENTID output
begin try update dbo.SPONSORSHIP set REVENUESPLITID = null, DATECHANGED = getdate(), CHANGEDBYID = @CHANGEAGENTID
where ID = @ID
return 0 end try begin catch exec dbo.USP_RAISE_ERROR return 1 end catch
end

StandardPrompt.Text: Are you sure you want to remove the Recurring Gift form this sponsorship?
